nodes.text: Tingel Deepspace Besh was a galactic-coordinate location. Nine months after the Battle of Yavin, the bulk of the Rebel Alliance Fleet took up sanctuary at Deepspace Besh, only to have its location betrayed to the Galactic Empire, leading to an ambush in which the Alliance Fleet was heavily devastated.
The Essential Atlas places Deepspace Besh in grid square P-13, in the Sepan sector of the Expansion Region.
